actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1027.
Senate vitiated its action on passage and returned to Calendar in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the study of certain lands to determine their suitability for designation as wilderness in accordance with the Wilderness Act of 1964.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Montana Wilderness Study Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to review specified lands in Montana as to their suitability for preservation as wilderness and report his findings to the President within five years. Authorizes the Secretary to approve an application for the construction of a transmission line for the purpose of providing electric service to the Big Sky complex and current electric power consumers in the Gallatin Valley. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provision of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the study of certain lands to determine their suitability for designation as wilderness in accordance with the Wilderness Act of 1964.
